note:
Researcher at ICMol, Universitat de València (Spain). Molecular nanomagnets, quantum computing. Computational chemistry, simple physics models.
Feel free to check out my recent/present projects (links to pdfs below):
2015-2021: decresim: A chemical approach to molecular spin qubits: decoherence and organisation of rare earth single ion magnets.
2022-2026: chiralpbit: Electrical control of probabilistic bits in chiral molecules
(he/him) (born at 332 ppm atmospheric CO2)
